scripts.dev: bun run sidecar:build:debug && bun --cwd apps/desktop dev
scripts.test:e2e: bun run sidecar:build:debug && bun --cwd apps/desktop build:renderer && bun x playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:packaged: node apps/desktop/scripts/smoke-packaged-dir.cjs && MARKBOOK_RUN_PACKAGED_E2E=1 bun x playwright test apps/desktop/e2e/packaged-smoke.e2e.spec.cjs
scripts.test:parity:regression: cargo test --manifest-path rust/markbookd/Cargo.toml --test parity_fixture_preflight --test calc_behavior_locks --test calc_parity_goldens --test assessment_stats_vs_fresh_legacy_summaries
scripts.test:parity:strict: MBC_STRICT_FRESH_SUMMARIES=1 cargo test --manifest-path rust/markbookd/Cargo.toml --test parity_fixture_preflight && MBC_STRICT_FRESH_SUMMARIES=1 cargo test --manifest-path rust/markbookd/Cargo.toml --test calc_behavior_locks --test calc_parity_goldens --test final_marks_vs_fresh_legacy_exports --test assessment_stats_vs_fresh_legacy_summaries
